data.title: 60+ Breakup Quotes, Messages, Status Online in 2024
data.meta_description: Breakup Quotes - Find the best break up status, quotes onine at FNP. Share your feelings with these amazing brekup quotes.
data.text:
I have not broken your heart...you have broken it; and in breaking it, you have broken mine.

- Emily Bronte

Hearts are breakable. Even when you heal, you're never what you were before.

- Cassandra Clare

Until this moment, I had not realized that someone could break your heart twice, along the very same fault lines.

- Jodi Picoult

Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don't.

- Stephen King

For my part, I prefer my heart to be broken. It is so lovely, dawn-kaleidoscopic within the crack.

- D. H. Lawrence

"Cheating and lying aren't struggles. They're reasons to break up."

- Patti Callahan Henry.

No man is rich enough to buy back his past

- Oscar Wilde.

"Love is unconditional. Relationships are not."

- Grant Gudmunson

Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake, help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.

- Mandy Hale

"He brought out the worst in me, and was the best thing that ever happened to me."

- Coco J. Ginger

"You fell in love with a storm. Did you really think you would get out unscathed?"

- Nikita Gill

"Do not allow me to forget you"

- Gabriel Garcia Marquez, Of Love and Other Demons

"Somehow everything I own smells of you, and for the tiniest moment it's all not true"

- Snow Patrol

"The only whole heart is a broken one because it lets the light in."

- David J. Wolpe

"It took a while for her to figure out she could run but when she did she was long gone, Long gone.."

- Keith Urban

"There is an ocean of silence between us… and I am drowning in it."

- Ranata Suzuki

"I would have followed you to hell and back... if only you'd lead me back."

― Ranata Suzuki

"Sometimes "Good bye" is just another way of saying "I love you"

- Dragos Bratasanu

"What happens to people that love each other? - I suppose they have whatever they have, and they are more fortunate than others. Then one of them gets the emptiness forever."

- Ernest Hemingway

"When you committed to love me, cherish me, be only with me, protect my heart, I took all that literally. Silly me."

- Melody Lee

"That you were able to walk away, gives me my answer as plain as day."

― Alfa H

"Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option."

- Mark Twain

"The hottest love has the coldest end."

- Socrates

"The heart was made to be broken."

- Oscar Wilde

"Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up."

- Marian Keyes

"No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief."

- Faraaz Kazi

"When you leave weary of me without a work, I shall gently let you go."

- Kim Sowol

"Like some wines our love could neither mature nor travel."

- Graham Greene

"I knew you didn't love me, but I dangerously adored you anyways."

- R. Y.S. Perez

"I write so I don’t call you."

― Jennifer Elisabeth

"The broken heart. You think you will die, but you keep living, day after day after terrible day."

- Charles Dickens

"When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead."

- Barney Stinson

"Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional."

- M. Kathleen Casey

"Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it’s not worth having."

- Sarah Mlynowski

"Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile."

- Gabriel Garcia Marquez
